p: Acid digestion of bean samples was performed according to Volpe et al. [ 24]. To one gram of dried sample, 16 mL of HNO 3/H 2O 2 (6/2, v/v) of solution were added. The mixture was heated to 130 Â°C until the solution became transparent. After cooling, the solution was filtered and diluted to 25 mL in a volumetric flask. The results were analyzed with Inductively Coupled Argon Plasma Optical Emission Spectrometers (ICP-OES).
